eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Information provided by the user by phone, email, filling questionnaire and survey, personally identifiable unique information (full name, mailing address, e-mail address, phone number, user name, account number, password, transaction history and preferences information), financial information, computer and other access device details including manually processed data.
privacyprograms: self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
recoursemech: If any customer has questions or complaints pertaining to our use of their personal data, they can contact ComplyGlobal's Head of Security at security@complyglobal.com. The verifications of the complaint will be undertaken in-house. If we are unable to resolve the disputes with the customers, the dispute will be referred to TRUSTe (http://www.truste.com) for resolution.
